alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:39AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches possible above 5500 feet; total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible above 8000 feet. South winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, particularly along Highway 93 north of Pioche. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of the snowfall will occur between 11 PM tonight and 8 AM PST Sunday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
